Text: WikiLeaks is a zionist paid organisation. They are leaking some truths and a bunch of lies. They are releasing docs about the entire world except the real terrorists the orthodox jews, zionists of isreal. This video is meant to demoralise americans and especially american soldiers. They used you for 10 years now they want to throw you away like a used condom. About the video - a bunch of adrenaline junkies like the heli pilot and gunner (call sign crazyhorse) are giving a bad name to the entire US military. They were worse than the terrorists in this video. I don't know if the first set of firing was justifiable or not but the second round of firing on the car that came to pick up dead bodies is certainly monstrous. It was like they thought they were playing CoD Modern Warfare 2 and shooting through a predator for fun. Would any army fire on the enemy's medics? Then why did the medic van get pwned in this video? How cruel is that? And then you wonder why people hate america and why there is an unlimited supply of terrorists? YOu fools are being taken for a ride by the israelis, pull them down from your US fake hijacked government, they are doing as much harm to you as to the rest of the world.

@kbx1982 - That Had to be one the the dumbest comments i have ever read. You obviously have no idea what you are talking about and your lack of mental capacity towards the subject is extremely limited. You apparently have no educated background on anything involving our government or any of the tragedies that have happened. Wiki-Leaks has been releasing many documents from OUR government for the sole intention on educating the people that are unaware of what is going on. What do orthodox Jews or zionists have to do with OUR government, and if they did whats that say about our government ? So basically, "Wiki-Leaks is a zionist paid orginization" which leaks files from OUR Government to try and do What ? You are probably the most idiotic person i have ever heard. Go take your un-educated bullshit somewhere else and leave TPB free and clean of your lack of knowledge. In the End YOU ARE the reason people hate america. Your the typical stereotype other countries have on us.."The Dumb Fucking American" Which you clearly showed and demonstrated...
